庸: (you) - comum, imposto pago para evitar trabalho forçado (período ritsuryō)

廃する: (はいする) - to abolish/to abandon/to repeal/to discontinue; to dethrone/to depose
廃める: (やめる) - (止める, 已める only) to stop (an activity)/to cease/to discontinue/to end/to quit; to cancel/to abandon/to give up/to abolish/to abstain/to refrain
